info.name: Joe Junior
info.title:
Joe
Junior
info.blurb: Famous for it's best-in-class burger, Joe Junior is a classic American diner a few blocks from Union Square.
info.intro: Many argue that Joe Junior makes the best burger in New York, and it’s what originally put Joe Junior on my radar. But it takes a lot more than a single signature dish to go from a decent restaurant to your favorite diner. Unfortunately I haven’t had the opportunity to try Joe Juniors legendary burger, and it would be unfair to call this review complete with such a major piece missing. So consider my opinion partially incomplete until I return to try out their burger. Fortunately for Joe Junior, they have more going for them than just burger-hype.
